# device

**Instance Property**

The device object that created the fence.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: any MTLDevice { get }
```

## Discussion

Only the device that created the fence can use it.

## Identifying a fence

- **label**: A string that identifies the fence.

items.description: A string that identifies the fence.
items.name: label
